item.title: Yahoo: Feds made us spy or pay $250K a day in fines - Washington Times
item.description:
Washington Times
Yahoo: Feds made us spy or pay $250K a day in fines
Washington Times
Yahoo says the government threatened to fine the company $250,000 a day if it did not comply with demands to go along with an expansion of U.S. surveillance laws by surrendering online information, a step the company regarded as unconstitutional.
